body_html: This question is better asked on Stack Overflow. But if you pip install the GPU CUDA version of TensorFlow, and then run bazel normally inside the models repository, things will most likely be fine.
body_text: This question is better asked on Stack Overflow. But if you pip install the GPU CUDA version of TensorFlow, and then run bazel normally inside the models repository, things will most likely be fine.
body: This question is better asked on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow). But if you pip install the GPU CUDA version of TensorFlow, and then run bazel normally inside the models repository, things will most likely be fine.
